instruction: Enrich the given input by adding at least 3 more elements to it.
input: Kobe was an exceptional basketball player.
output: Kobe was an exceptional basketball player who was known for his incredible work ethic, unwavering mental toughness and being able to outthink opponents on the court. He was a 5-time champion, 18-time All Star and was renowned as one of the greatest players of all time. His desire to constantly improve and perfect his craft pushed him to an unparalleled level of success. He will be remembered, not only as a legendary athlete, but also as a humanitarian who championed causes to bring positive change to society.
